OOC: I'm back. I am now taking control back from Yanshosh.

::Hot Rod::

The blast send him flying back. He gets up. His outer armor is shreded
scrap, but he is still ok. He looks like the most pissed off bot alive.
"Big mistake!" He shoots two thermo energy missiles at Serge.(Think of a
small nuke explosian. Just large enough for one bot.)

::DrillBit::

"Hey StarScream, how much longer?"

::Dimolition::

"I suggest its gestalt time!"
